trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> 控件提供设计时支持。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> class is intended for use by the XmlDataSource control, and not intended for use by developers of custom XML data source controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner>类是旨在由 XmlDataSource 控件中，使用并不旨在由自定义 XML 数据源控件的开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> method can be called; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure" /> 方法，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> method can be called, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" /> 方法，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 启动基础数据源配置向导。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A> method is called by the design host, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A>设计宿主中，调用方法，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a block of XML that the associated data source control binds to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联的数据源控件所绑定的 XML 块。

trans-unit.source: A string of XML data.
trans-unit.target: XML 数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data%2A>属性隐藏在关联的控件中，相同的属性，并且旨在仅供内部使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file name of an XML file that the associated data source control binds to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关联的数据源控件所绑定到的 XML 文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: An XML file name.
trans-unit.target: XML 文件名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile%2A>属性隐藏在关联的控件中，相同的属性，并且旨在仅供内部使用。

trans-unit.source: The path to the view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的视图的路径。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the design-time data source view object for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 为关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> 控件检索设计时数据源视图对象。

trans-unit.source: The design-time data source view object for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource" /> 控件的设计时数据源视图对象。

trans-unit.source: The component.
trans-unit.target: 组件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer and loads the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 初始化设计器并加载指定的组件。

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="IDictionary" /> of properties.
trans-unit.target: 属性的 <see langword="IDictionary" />。

trans-unit.source: Used by a designer component to add properties to or remove properties from, the Properties grid in a design host at design time or to provide new design-time properties that might correspond to properties on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 由设计器组件在设计时用来在设计宿主的“属性”网格中添加或移除属性，或提供可能与关联控件的属性对应的新的设计时属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to suppress schema UI events; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果取消架构 UI 事件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema from the data source, while optionally suppressing events.
trans-unit.target: 在可以选择取消事件时从数据源刷新架构。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data source can be configured; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以配置数据源，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以刷新架构，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The name of a view in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: 基础数据源中的视图的名称。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetView(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetView(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> object containing information about the identified view, or <see langword="null" /> if a view with the specified name is not found.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关标识的视图信息的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> 对象，或者，如果未找到具有指定名称的视图，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of names of the views in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源中的视图的名称数组。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to suppress any events raised while refreshing the schema.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否取消刷新架构时引发的所有事件。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a block of Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data" /> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个可扩展样式表语言 (XSL) 块，该语言块定义将对 XML 数据执行的 XSLT 转换，XML 数据包含在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data" /> 属性或由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile" /> 属性指示的 XML 文件中。

trans-unit.source: An XSL data string.
trans-unit.target: XSL 数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A>属性隐藏在关联的控件中，相同的属性，并且旨在仅供内部使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file name of an Extensible Stylesheet Language (XSL) file (.xsl) that defines an XSLT transformation to perform on the XML data that is contained by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data" /> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可扩展样式表语言 (XSL) 文件 (.xsl) 的文件名，该文件定义将对 XML 数据执行的 XSLT 转换，XML 数据包含在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data" /> 属性或由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile" /> 属性指示的 XML 文件中。

trans-unit.source: The XSLT file name.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 文件名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A>属性隐藏在关联的控件中，相同的属性，并且旨在仅供内部使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an XPath query to apply to the XML data that is contained by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data" /> property or by the XML file that is indicated by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于 XML 数据的 XPath 查询，XML 数据包含在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Data" /> 属性或由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.DataFile" /> 属性指示的 XML 文件中。

trans-unit.source: An XPath query.
trans-unit.target: XPath 查询。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A> property shadows the same property in the associated control, and is intended for internal use only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner.Transform%2A>属性隐藏在关联的控件中，相同的属性，并且旨在仅供内部使用。
